Class UserConsole

java.lang.Object
mainConsole.UserConsole
public class UserConsole extends Object
UserConsole handles the user management interface for the Home Appliance Store. It allows for user creation, updating, deletion, and searching as well as managing user roles and addresses.
Author:
24862664

      role - the role of the user to add (e.g., admin, customer, business)
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added, false otherwise

    • addAddressInterface

      public String addAddressInterface()
      Provides an interface to add an address to a user.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the success or failure of the address addition process.

    • userAddressHandler

      private Address userAddressHandler(int user_id)
      Collects address details from the user and returns an Address object.
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the user to which the address will be linked.
      Returns:
      An Address object with the provided details.

    • addAddressHandler

      private boolean addAddressHandler(int user_id)
      Handles the process of adding an address for a user. This method calls the userAddressHandler to collect address details and then attempts to add the address to the database.
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the user to which the address will be added.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the address was successfully added.

    • updateAddressHandler

      private int updateAddressHandler(int user_id)
      Handles the process of updating a user's address. This method calls the userAddressHandler to collect updated address details and then attempts to update the user's address in the database.
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the user whose address is being updated.
      Returns:
      An integer indicating the number of rows affected by the update.

    • selectAddressType

      private Address selectAddressType(String addressType, String number, String street, String city, String country, String postCode, int customerId, boolean isPrimary)
      Selects the address type (Shipping or Billing) based on the user input and creates the appropriate address object.
      Parameters:
      addressType - The type of address selected by the user ("1" for shipping, "2" for billing).
      number - The building number of the address.
      street - The street of the address.
      city - The city of the address.
      country - The country of the address.
      postCode - The postcode of the address.
      customerId - The ID of the user to whom the address belongs.
      isPrimary - Whether the address is primary or not.
      Returns:
      An Address object of the appropriate type (Shipping or Billing).

    • isPrimaryAddress

      private boolean isPrimaryAddress(String isPrimaryInput)
      Determines whether the address is a primary address based on the user's input.
      Parameters:
      isPrimaryInput - The user's input indicating whether the address is primary or not.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the address is primary.

    • handleAdminStatus

      private String handleAdminStatus()
      Handles the process of updating the admin status for a user.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the admin status operation.
